title: TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree for Indoor Kitten Small Cats with Green Leaves, Cozy Plush Indoor Plant Design Cat House Cute Cat Condo Cat Scratching Posts with Hang Ball, Green Pet Home Cat Furniture
descriptions:
Bring the outdoors in and give your kitty a cozy paradise with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree. Designed as a 2-in-1 cat condo and sisal scratching post, this adorable indoor “plant” blends effortlessly into your home while keeping claws off your furniture. Lush green leaves add a touch of fresh décor, while the plush, 600g skin-friendly fabric and soft carpeted base create a snuggly retreat your cat will love.

Why you’ll love it:
- Cute plant-inspired design: Doubles as stylish home greenery that looks great in any room.
- Cozy condo + play station: Perfect for kittens or one medium cat to nap, hide, and play, with a dangling ball to spark hunting instincts.
- Furniture-saving scratching: Durable sisal posts satisfy natural scratching needs.
- Stable and secure: Tip-resistant base reduces wobbling; best placed on a flat floor against a wall.
- Soft, premium comfort: Thick, skin-friendly plush for ultimate snuggles.
- Quick, tool-included assembly: Set up in 1–8 minutes with the included instructions and tools.
- Lightweight convenience: Weighs just 6 lbs for easy repositioning.

Product details:
- Dimensions: 11" L x 15" W x 41" H
- Colors: Grey, Beige, Green
- What’s in the box: 1 Cat Tree, 1 Assembly Instruction, 1 Set of Tools

Notes: Please check size before purchasing. For added stability, place on a flat floor against a wall. Do not allow children to play with the cat tree.

TSCOMON is committed to quality and attentive service—reach out anytime. Treat your cat to a stylish sanctuary that’s as beautiful as it is fun.
